{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3423868,"name":null,"username":"Maugar","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/m/d6d6ee/{size}.png","created_at":"2024-09-15T13:35:00.417Z","cooked":"

Hi all!!!

I recently purchased 2 NEOs and 2 controllers SPARK MAX. I’m trying to change the settings of the REV Har. Client but I have no luck so far (it’s really fast). The only thing I could do was to change the CtrlType form Percentage to Voltage: the speed decreases but now it’s too slow. Do you guys know how to change the speed??
Thanks in advance!!!

We need a bit more information… Are you trying to run these with the REV hardware client directly, or via the RoboRio?

You can run a NEO/SparkMAX directly from the client using a slider and on/off buttons. Here’s the walkthrough:

docs.revrobotics.com

Make it Spin! | REV ION Brushless

Thanks for answering!

I’m using the REV HC. This is a kind of tank and I use a HOTRc to control it. But I’d like to do the changes through REV HC.
